customIcon.label: Custom Icon
customIcon.help: Name of the custom Material Design Icon

info.text: Please provide the name of an icon in this form "home-automation" (small letters with dashes between the words) or in this form "mdiHomeAutomation" (with leading 'mdi' prefix and camel case words) for the "Home Automation" Icon

displayName.label: Display name
displayName.help: Name to be shown in the user interface

rank.label: Display rank
rank.help: Rank number to be used to determine the sorting of the element in the context of others.
